Question: This person died on February 25, 2013, at the age of 96 at his home in Hanover, New Hampshire.
Hints: This person was able to establish the nation's first neonatal surgical intensive care unit there in 1956.
This person later wrote that "each day of those early years in pediatric surgery I felt I was on the cutting edge.
